qa_pairs.question: What's your term for the season?
What would be the outcome when EF publishes similar announcements as Kadena, as they are running out of funds, etc. Should we be sharing on socials why EF actually isn't behind the core Devon, etc.?
qa_pairs.answer: EF was established a month after the main net launch in November or December 2019. To that moment, Ergo was listed on like five or six exchanges and development went well without EF. Things were made without the EF for starters, for many months.

qa_pairs.question: Is Binance now available in the US?
qa_pairs.answer: It's a Binance US domain that the government kind of made them give up ownership of that.

qa_pairs.question: Why not set up example and just bring them, adopt them to the Rosen Bridge and bring the whole chain and use the wrapped assets on Ergo instead of giving them another solution to adopt to it?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah actually a good idea right so well if for some reason well usually for having big losses and well inability to fix them so someone is still a stick to a company owned blockchain right so we may offer well, just to try Ergo for starters as a plan B, right?
